description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. This is an online first person shooter game, where you play free for all against up to 7 other players or bots, play on 6 unique multiplayer maps and rank yourself up to become General of the Army. Mission coop 4 players. Play up to 4 player split screen local or online, and if you have a 3D tv, you can even play the game in 3D.
